title: Looking for T205 Mordecai Brown and others
author: cobbcobb13

posts.post_title: Looking for T205 Mordecai Brown and others
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone, Im dipping my toe into the T205 set. 
Im starting with one of my favorite players. 

Id be opening to buy a large lot of raw and/or graded T205 cards. 
Hit me up
What are you looking for as far as condition?  Graded or raw?
